plot: Two young lovers decide to take a trip out into the English countryside on a warm summers day, only to discover that they are not alone and that they are being pursued by a mysterious stranger.
title: Hugging the Devil Tree
plot_es: Two young lovers decide to take a trip out into the English countryside on a warm summers day, only to discover that they are not alone and that they are being pursued by a mysterious stranger.
plot_en: Two young lovers decide to take a trip out into the English countryside on a warm summers day, only to discover that they are not alone and that they are being pursued by a mysterious stranger.
